blacklist.name: blacklist
blacklist.description: Manage a blacklist of words in a specific group.
blacklist.help:
*Blacklist*

Manage a blacklist of words in a specific group.

*Commands*

!blacklist add [word]
!blacklist remove [word]
!blacklist list

*How to Use*

Use !blacklist add [word] to add a word to the blacklist. Use !blacklist remove [word] to remove a word from the blacklist. Use !blacklist list to see the current blacklist.

blacklist.add.media_success: The media has been added to the blacklist.
blacklist.add.word_success: The word "{word}" has been added to the blacklist.
blacklist.remove.no_word_or_media: Please provide a word or quote a message/media to remove from the blacklist.
blacklist.remove.media_success: The media has been removed from the blacklist.
blacklist.remove.word_success: The word "{word}" has been removed from the blacklist.
blacklist.list.empty: There are no words or media in the blacklist.
blacklist.list.words: The following words are in the blacklist: {wordList}.
blacklist.list.media: There are {mediaCount} media items in the blacklist.

chm.name: chm
chm.description: Play a game where you guess missing characters in a Chinese paragraph!
chm.help:
*Chinese Game*

Play a game where you guess missing characters in a Chinese paragraph. Start a new game with !chm start and guess characters with !chm [character].

*Commands*

!chm start
!chm delete
chm.start.game_in_progress: A game is already in progress. Type !chm delete to delete the current game.
chm.start.success:
I have removed {numCharactersRemoved} Chinese characters from a passage in "{passageName}". Here's the masked paragraph:

```{maskedParagraph}```

Send ```!chm [character]``` to guess.
chm.delete.success: Game deleted. The original paragraph was: "{paragraph}".
chm.guess.no_game: Use ```!chm start``` to start a new game.
chm.guess.invalid_character: Please enter a valid Chinese character.
chm.guess.already_guessed: You already guessed "{guess}". Try another character.
chm.guess.incorrect_character: Sorry, "{guess}" is not the correct character.
chm.guess.win: Congratulations! You won! The original paragraph was: "{paragraph}".
chm.guess.correct_character:
Good guess! Here's the updated paragraph:

```{newMaskedParagraph}```

 Send !chm [character] to guess.

hangman.help:
*Hangman*

Play hangman. See the commands.

*Commands*

!hangman start
!hangman config
!hangman score

*How to Play*

You will be given a hidden word with underscores representing each letter. Send !hangman [letter] to guess. If the letter is in the word, all occurrences of that letter will be revealed in the hidden word. If the letter is not in the word, you will lose one of your six guesses. If you guess all the letters before running out of guesses, you win! To start a new game, use the command "!hangman start". To make a guess, send !hangman [letter] after the initial message.

story.help:
*Story*

Collaboratively write stories word by word.

*Commands*

!story add [word] - Add a word to the current story.
!story see [id] - View a story by its ID (defaults to current story).
!story new [word] - Start a new story, adding the first word.
!story list [page] - List recent stories (defaults to first page).
!story current [id] - Set a story as the current story.
!story pop [id] - Remove the last word from a story (owner only).
!story remove [id] - Remove a story by its ID (owner only).
shorten.help:
*Shorten URL*

Shorten a given URL with optional custom suffix.

!shorten [url]
!shorten [url] [custom-suffix]
Or,
Reply to a message with a URL and type !shorten
Reply to a message with a URL and type !shorten [custom-suffix]

schedule.help:
*Schedule Message*

Schedule a message to be sent later.

!schedule [date and time] [chat ID(s)]
Or,
Reply to a message and type !schedule [date and time] [chat ID(s)]

Date and time format e.g.: 'tomorrow at 10am' or 'next Monday 2pm'
Chat ID(s) are optional, defaults to current chat ID if not provided.

qr.help:

nato.help:
*NATO Phonetic Alphabet*

Convert text to NATO phonetic alphabet.

!nato [text]
Or,
Reply to a message with text and type !nato

ai.no_argument:
Please provide a command or prompt.

Usage: !ai [prompt] or !ai [model] [prompt]
Management: !ai [clear|history|export|stats|models|use|help]
ai.invalid_command: Invalid command. Use: clear, history, export, stats, models, use, help, or provide a prompt.
ai.description: Unified AI assistant with multiple models
ai.help:
*AI - Unified Assistant*

*Chat with AI:*
!ai [prompt] - Use default model
!ai gemini [prompt] - Use Gemini
!ai gpt [prompt] - Use GPT
!ai llama [prompt] - Use Llama
!ai ds [prompt] - Use DeepSeek
!ai evilllama [prompt] - Use EvilLlama

*Model Management:*
!ai use [model] - Set default model
!ai models - List all models

*Conversation Management:*
!ai clear [model|all] - Clear history
!ai history [model] - View history
!ai export [model] - Export conversation
!ai stats - Show statistics

*Features:*
‚úì Persistent conversation memory
‚úì Vision support (Gemini, GPT)
‚úì Automatic context retention
‚úì Per-chat model preferences

*Examples:*
!ai What is quantum computing?
!ai gemini Explain this image
!ai use gpt
!ai clear all
